content.text: Hi, I'm Jake, how's it going?
Hello, I'm doing well, thanks for asking!
I'm glad to hear that. What are your hobbies?
I love to go to museums and see all the amazing exhibits. I also love riding my bike.
Those sound like fun hobbies. I love to go for walks with my dogs every day. What's your favorite holiday?
My favorite holiday is Thanksgiving because I love to cook for my family and friends.
That's a great holiday to cook for others. I love cooking too! I'm from Russia, what about you?
I'm from the United States. I've been working on my car at night, trying to fix it without them knowing.
That's really impressive! I wish I could work on cars. I love to help others too, it's really rewarding.
It is rewarding! I'm glad I could come to terms with my past and now I'm focused on helping others.
That's great to hear. I'm happy for you. Do you have any pets?
I don't have any pets, but I love my parents. What about you?
I have two dogs, a golden retriever and a beagle. They're both great dogs.
Sounds like you have a great family. I'm glad you're doing well.
Thank you. I'm glad you're doing well too.
